name: O'Rato Cambalhota
description:
The Goal of this game is to reach the finish line the fastest you can with the most coins.

Controls: PC

WASD - Movement

P - Pause

M - Mute

Controls: mobile

Tilt - Movement

*If you feel the movement on mobile uncomfortable you can calibrate it on the settings menu

Music is not ours, it comes from:

Klonoa 2 - Joilant

Klonoa 2 - Jungle Drums
